report.name: 地方财政收入按财政分片统计

paraDetail.sql: SELECT A.*,substr(BM,1,4)||'年'||substr(bm,5,2)||'月' NAME FROM(SELECT DISTINCT(TO_CHAR(NY))BM,1 ISLEAF,'' PID FROM BB_SRTJ )A ORDER BY BM DESC

report.title: $pa_ny$地方财政收入按财政分片统计

rptData.sql:
select a.*,round(decode(snhj,0,0,(hj-snhj)/snhj*100),2) HJZF , round(decode(SNBJ,0,0,(BJ-SNBJ)/SNBJ*100),2) BJZF, round(decode(SNXXJD,0,0,(XXJD-SNXXJD)/SNXXJD*100),2) XXJDZF, round(decode(SNBYJD,0,0,(BYJD-SNBYJD)/SNBYJD*100),2) BYJDZF FROM( select szbm,mc,round(sum(hj/{pDw}),2) HJ , round(sum(snhj/{pDw}),2) SNHJ,round(sum(bj/{pDw}),2) BJ,round(sum(snbj/{pDw}),2) SNBJ,round(sum(xxjd/{pDw}),2) XXJD,round(sum(snxxjd/{pDw}),2) SNXXJD,round(sum(byjd/{pDw}),2) BYJD,round(sum(snbyjd/{pDw}),2) SNBYJD
from(
select a.szbm szbm,b.mc mc,sum(v003) hj,0 snhj,sum(decode(czfpbm,'801',v003,'0')) bj,0 snbj, sum(decode(czfpbm,'802',v003,'0')) xxjd,0 snxxjd,sum(decode(czfpbm,'803',v003,'0')) byjd,0 snbyjd from bb_srtj a,bm_sz b where ny={pa_ny} and lxbm={pa_lx} and a.szbm=b.bm group by a.szbm, b.mc union all select a.szbm szbm,b.mc mc,0 hj,sum(v003) snhj,0 bj,sum(decode(czfpbm,'801',v003,'0')) snbj, 0 xxjd,sum(decode(czfpbm,'802',v003,'0')) snxxjd,0 byjd,sum(decode(czfpbm,'803',v003,'0')) snbyjd from bb_srtj a,bm_sz b where ny={pa_ny}-10000 and lxbm={pa_lx} and a.szbm=b.bm group by a.szbm, b.mc union all select 9999 szbm,'合计' mc,sum(v003) hj,0 snhj,sum(decode(czfpbm,'801',v003,'0')) bj,0 snbj, sum(decode(czfpbm,'802',v003,'0')) xxjd,0 snxxjd,sum(decode(czfpbm,'803',v003,'0')) byjd,0 snbyjd from bb_srtj a,bm_sz b where ny={pa_ny} and lxbm={pa_lx} and a.szbm=b.bm union all select 9999 szbm,'合计' mc,0 hj,sum(v003) snhj,0 bj,sum(decode(czfpbm,'801',v003,'0')) snbj, 0 xxjd,sum(decode(czfpbm,'802',v003,'0')) snxxjd,0 byjd,sum(decode(czfpbm,'803',v003,'0')) snbyjd from bb_srtj a,bm_sz b where ny={pa_ny}-10000 and lxbm={pa_lx} and a.szbm=b.bm ) group by szbm,mc order by szbm,mc ) a
order by a.szbm,a.mc desc
